title: League stuck at 99%
body: So, recently i had to re-install league of legends, and now it's been stuck at 99%(i've been downloading for most of  the day)

replies.body: You might have a weak connection, so your patcher is trying to go back and pick up missed files to update.  Unless you are getting any errors it's best to leave it alone until it's done.  You can then go over to our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network strength for any future updates.  Let me know if that clears things up!
i quit it then opened it back up, it fixed it
